metadata.title: CVE-2019-11701 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The default webcal: protocol handler will load a web site vulnerable tocross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. This default was left in place as alegacy feature and has now been removed. *Note: this issue only affectsusers with an account on the vulnerable service. Other users areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 67.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11701` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '67.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
